title: League on the Mac- client won't open
body: Hi guys, I just downloaded league on my mac (the installer) and I double click on the dmg. and the client opens in my task bar but nothing opens on the screen. Somebody please help me I give free chicken

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Ediwir,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=dXAUKlPe,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-06-25T05:18:18.882+0000)
>
> Right, spend a lot of money for a gaming PC, time two months and you need to buy a new graphic card.
> PCs are the iPhones of gaming.
> 
> {{champion:48}}

ns if srs or not, pc is ever evolving at most you have to change your graphics card every 2-3 years, and as for the price you gotta be joking right ? the average price for an imac that will do half of what a AMD quad core will do is atleast $1500 when you can easily buy quad to 6-core AMD for between $400-$800 and is easily customised, there is a reason it takes 3+ years for games to come out on mac, becuase the os sucks ass, if you game buy pc if you like to play garage band buy mac

mine sometimes doesn't come up but when you look at the side bar thing down the bottom you see its loading it will come up when it does.. I'm not sure if it helps but that what happens to me after patches or just random moments

This happens to me too, click the icon again and it will come up with a message saying "an instance of this launcher is already open do you want to terminate" click yes and it should come up, if there is a patch tho (like today) you might need to do it multiple times
...or just quit the launcher from opt-cmd-power (or the apple menu on the top left corner).

Do NOT launch programs from their DMG!
Copy them in Application first. Dude, you're trying to run a program from its compressed form... Ofc it'll be slower than normal.
Also, if it's the first opening, it'll take a bit before the launcher shows up - first thing installer does, is updating the patcher itself. Therefore it doesn't show (usually for a few seconds, but then again you're running it compressed).
